Fantasy 











 





Dallas does it
 




Avery Johnson points the Mavs to the No. 1 seed.  (Getty Images)



      It's official. Led 
      by Dirk Nowitzki's 26 points, the Mavs clinch the league's top 
      record with a 96-86 victory over the Clippers. In the East, Toronto 
      extends its lead over Miami, just as Tony Mejia 
      predicts in his Weekly Essentials.

 Power Rankings: Season provides reasons to smile


    

      
      The defending Cup finalists are already golfing, and a wide-open game 
      has yielded new contenders a chance to win it all. 
      Unpredictability is good, Wes Goldstein says.
    

  
• Top stories | Playoffs start Wed. | Avs' Sakic signs


 

 





 Feud of the Week: Try franchising for a change of pace


    

      Want a shakeup? Try 
      franchising. Want better ratings? Try cutting back on the 
      commercials. Brian De Los Santos and Charlie McCarthy have 
      answers to NASCAR's ills.
